view.name: Publications
view.query: SELECT P.PubID, P.Publisher, P.Year, X.Type, X.Title, X.Issue FROM a37g3.dbo.Publication P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.Title, B.PubID, Null as Issue, 'Book' as Type FROM a37g3.dbo.Books B UNION SELECT M.Title, M.PubID, M.Issue, 'Magazine' as Type FROM a37g3.dbo.Magazines M ) AS X ON P.PubID = X.PubID ORDER BY P.PubID
